text.section: The Department may adopt regulations to increase the minimum amounts of liability insurance coverage under subsection (a)(6) of this section.
The Department shall adopt regulations requiring each holder of a permit to drill for gas or oil to have equipment available for the prevention and containment of gas leaks and oil spills.

A holder of a permit to drill for gas or oil may:
Post the performance bond under subsection (a)(5) of this section in:
Cash;
Certificates of deposit;
Letters of credit from any bank or other savings institution; or
Any other good and sufficient security; and
Provide for the holder's own liability insurance under subsection (a)(6) of this section.
